txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

Wanted: Coarse skin necessary to make tougher gloves for workers here in the Lone-lands. The skins can be found from beasts that wander the Lone-lands to the east. Deliver to Lieva Dourlily at The Forsaken Inn.
'This is exactly what I was looking for...they will make excellent gloves.\n\n'Thank you.'
'There are many beasts here in the Lone-lands, but only those dwelling to the east will have skin coarse enough for what I need.'
Lieva Dourlily has asked for a collection of coarse skins to be delivered to her at The Forsaken Inn.
Deliver the coarse skin to Lieva Dourlily at The Forsaken Inn
You accepted a task from Lieva Dourlily to acquire coarse skins from the beasts in the Lone-lands. You can find Lieva Dourlily within The Forsaken Inn.
Wanted: Coarse skin necessary to make tougher gloves for workers in the Lone-lands.
